skill.name: Holy Shield Smash
skill.value: Deals 1228/1468 DMG to the row of enemies directly in front, with a high chance of inflicting Stun.

ability.name: Song of Spring (Lv. 54)
ability.value: All melee allies take slightly less DMG.

ability.name: Blossom Report (Lv. 84)
ability.value: Reflects 10% of the DMG taken back to attacker.
